<center>

**Derrama económica de la IMCC vs. PIB de estados seleccionados**

<br>

```{r echo = FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}

library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)
library(DT)

PIB_paises <- read_excel("Tablas_comparaciones.xlsx", sheet = 'PIB_ESTADOS') 

PIB_paises %>%
  datatable(
    rownames = FALSE,
    #filter = "top",
    width = 700,
    options = list(#pageLength = 5,
      #scrollX = T,
      #searching = TRUE,
      #lengthMenu = c(5,10,25),
    columnDefs = list(
        list(className = 'dt-center',
             targets = 0:2)
      ))
  ) %>%
  formatCurrency(
    c(2),
    currency = '$',
    interval = 3,
    mark = ',',
    digits = 2
  ) %>% 
  formatPercentage(c(3), 
                   digits = 1)



```
